channel.title: Java Problem
channel.description:
I dont know if this is a server problem or a client problem so i'm sorry if it's in the wrong section..... Okay well i'm using the source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401866.0.html I will turn on no-ip.org Start Server Turn on utorrent for portforwarding Start Client I will log in and then the screen will load If i sit in 1 spot the client wont close but if i click in 2 different spots the client will close and i get disconnected from the server.
Any help? P.S. It used to only happen to this client, but now i can only play on 1 server all the other 1s will close the client... so basically i can't start my own server or join someone elses ( besides Dhistory ) .
These are my Environment Variables
User Variables : Classpath : CLASSPATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%; JDK : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\
System Variables : Path : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin
I have more Java downloads, if these variables have to deal with the problem or are wrongly setup please tell me.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 08:55:03 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 09:08:22 pm[/size][hr]Code for running server : @echo off title Lunar Deception java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
Code for running client : @echo off java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

all i did was change the ip to my servers lol, so i highly doubt that, and i just tried it normal with 127.1.0.0 ip and it still closed on me.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

It might be if you did something wrong to it. X.X

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

well there are 2 servers using this source from what i have found and i havent heard anything about an error on the download section of it, so i don’t think it’s nulled

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Then your server is most likely nulled. In which case, I have no way of helping you. It may eventually Un-null, but until then, I suggest keeping this open for more answers from other people.

I’m not positive it’s nulled, as this has never happened to me, but it looks like it from your description.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

I have the client and the source ( they are both same source ), btw i can change it so i don;t have to use the client that is normally required for the server but like i said my head gets all messed up and i get that guthix thing on my shirt, but yeah i have the original server and client.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Your source may be nulled?

If not, the Source might have been assigned a Client that is REQUIRED in order to play it. Try searching for a Client with a similar name to your original source.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

I have used about 5 different clients for this server lol, when i log in i am like deformed. my head will be in my body, i will have a guthix sign on my chest, and no items on.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

The Client and Source versions may be different. This means that the Source may be a 317, but the Client may have been for a 508. I’m not completely sure, but I will look into this. Please look in the downloads section, and look for a 317 client, and try to use that one. Tell me what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

I dont know if this is a server problem or a client problem so i’m sorry if it’s in the wrong section…
Okay well i’m using the source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401866.0.html
I will turn on no-ip.org
Start Server
Turn on utorrent for portforwarding
Start Client
I will log in and then the screen will load
If i sit in 1 spot the client wont close but if i click in 2 different spots the client will close and i get disconnected from the server.

Any help? P.S. It used to only happen to this client, but now i can only play on 1 server all the other 1s will close the client… so basically i can’t start my own server or join someone elses ( besides Dhistory ) .

These are my Environment Variables

User Variables :
Classpath : CLASSPATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
JDK : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\

System Variables :
Path : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin

I have more Java downloads, if these variables have to deal with the problem or are wrongly setup please tell me.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 08:55:03 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 09:08:22 pm[/size][hr]Code for running server :
@echo off
title Lunar Deception
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Code for running client :
@echo off
java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic
